name: Pizza Girl Arcade Delivery
description:
Pizza Girl was the first mobile game we developed in ICAD / VisionLab.

It was our first major game using Unity (2018) as well.

It's not accessible via App or Play Store anymore, so for the sake of keeping our history of development and portfolio items alive, I made it available through WebGL.

An experimental .apk is available as well.

The Team

  • Augusto Baffa - Programmer
  • Felipe Holanda Bezerra - Programmer & Composer
  • Felipe Zarattini Miranda - Programmer
  • Hugo Rodrigues Manhães - Programmer
  • Isabella Guaríglia - Artist
  • José Paulo Diniz - Programmer
  • Leonardo Malavasi - Designer & Artist
  • Maurício Lana - Programmer
  • Pedro de Andrade - Programmer & Designer
